13021.en: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>Heheheh... This is it. This is the place.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13021.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「ひっひっひっ……。
　そうです。この場所でございます。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13021.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 히히히…….
　그렇습니다, 바로 이곳입니다.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13021.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>嘿嘿嘿……
没错，就是这里。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13021.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻……
沒錯，就是這裡。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13022.en:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>Now, please close your eyes. Slowly, gaze into your
own heart.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13022.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「さあ　目を閉じてくださいませ。
　ゆっくりと　おのれの心を　見つめるのです。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13022.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 자, 눈을 감으십시오.
　그리고 천천히 자신의 마음을 들여다보십시오.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13022.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>来，请闭上眼睛。
慢慢直视自己的内心。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13022.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>來，請閉上眼睛。
慢慢直視自己的內心。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13023.en: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>Your weakness, coarseness, apathy, pride, cruelty...<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13023.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「あなたさまの　弱さ　粗暴さ
　薄情さ　高慢さ　残酷さ……。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13023.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 당신의 나약함, 난폭함,
　박정함, 오만함, 잔혹함…….<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13023.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>您的弱小、粗暴、
薄情、高傲、残忍……<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13023.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>您的弱小、粗暴、
薄情、高傲、殘忍……<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13024.en:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>No matter how much ugliness is found in your heart,
there is nothing to be ashamed of.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13024.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「どんなに　みにくい心を
　あなたさまの中に　見いだしても
　恥じることは　ございません。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13024.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 당신 안에 어떤 추악한 마음이 있든
　부끄러워할 필요는 없습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13024.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>无论您发现自己的内心有多么丑陋，
都没有必要为它感到羞愧。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13024.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>無論您發現自己的內心有多麼醜陋，
都沒有必要為此
感到羞愧。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13025.en:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>The important thing is to know that there is also
darkness in your heart.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13025.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「大切なのは　あなたさまの心にも
　闇があるのを　知ること。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13025.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 중요한 것은 당신의 마음속에도
　어둠이 있다는 것을 깨닫는 것.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13025.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>重要的是，
了解到自己内心中也有黑暗。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13025.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>重要的是，
瞭解自己內心中也有黑暗。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13026.en: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>Look into the darkness of your own heart.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13026.ja: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「ご自身の心の闇を　見つめるのでございます。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13026.ko: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 마음속의 어둠을 바라보십시오.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13026.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>直视自己内心的黑暗吧。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13026.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>直視自己內心的黑暗吧。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13027.en: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>Now, open your eyes and see for yourself.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13027.ja: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「さあ　目を開けて　ご覧ください。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13027.ko: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 자, 눈을 뜨십시오.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13027.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>来，请睁开眼睛看吧。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13027.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>來，請睜開眼睛看看吧。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13028.en: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>This darkness is that came from inside you.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13028.ja: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「この闇は　あなたさまの中に　あったもの。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13028.ko: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 이 어둠은 당신 안에 있던 것입니다.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13028.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>这便是在您心中的黑暗。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13028.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>這便是在您心中的黑暗。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13029.en: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>From now on, you will fight your own beserker.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13029.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「これより　あなたさまが戦うのは
　あなたさま　ご自身の　狂戦士。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13029.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 이제부터 당신이 싸울 상대는
　당신 내면의 광전사입니다.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13029.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>接下来，您要与自己
内心的狂战士战斗。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13029.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>接下來，您要與自己
內心的狂戰士戰鬥。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13030.en:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>With a strong heart, you will conquer your own
darkness!<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13030.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「強い心で　おのれの闇に
　打ち勝つのでございます！<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13030.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 강인한 마음으로 내면의 어둠을
　이겨내십시오!<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13030.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>请用强大的心灵去战胜自己的黑暗吧！<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13030.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>請用強大的心靈
去戰勝自己的黑暗吧！<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13031.ja: <start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ギシャアアアアアアアア！！！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13031.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>喝啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13031.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>喝啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13032.ja: <start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「グ……　ァ……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13032.ko: <start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 으…… 아…….<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

38865.ja: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「ひっひっひっ……。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

38866.en:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>...Certainly, you have seen it with your own eyes.
Now, please return back to my place.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
38866.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「……しかと　見届けさせていただきましたぞ。
　さあ　わたくしめの所へ　お戻りくださいませ。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
38866.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: ……잘 봤습니다.
　자, 제가 있는 곳으로 돌아오십시오.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
38866.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>……您的表现我全都看到了。
请回到我这里来吧。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
38866.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>……您的表現我全都看到了。
請回到我這裡來吧。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
